meanings.definition: A set of circumstances that makes it possible to do something.
meanings.sent1: In school, we have many opportunities to learn new things.
meanings.sent2: She saw a job posting that offered great opportunities for growth.
meanings.sent3: Missing the bus was actually an opportunity to enjoy a leisurely walk to work.
meanings.sent4: The blank canvas presented endless opportunities for artistic expression.
meanings.sent5: The internship abroad provided exciting opportunities to immerse in a new culture.

meanings.definition: A chance for advancement or progress.
meanings.sent1: Taking on new challenges can lead to exciting opportunities for success.
meanings.sent2: The scholarship offered her the opportunity to pursue higher education.
meanings.sent3: When the power went out, it was an opportunity for a candlelit dinner.
meanings.sent4: Each mistake is an opportunity to learn and grow.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected meeting with the CEO was a golden opportunity to pitch her ideas.

meanings.sent1: The sunny weather provided the perfect opportunity for a picnic.
meanings.sent2: He seized the opportunity to showcase his talent at the talent show.
meanings.sent3: Losing his phone was an opportunity to disconnect and relax.
meanings.sent4: The quiet library was an opportunity to focus and study.
meanings.sent5: The holiday season is a wonderful opportunity to spend time with loved ones.
